author: Staff Reporter
text:
A change in pattern of MRTS train services has been announced due to line block to facilitate various engineering works like rail renewal and interchanging of rails on the Chennai Beach-Velachery MRTS section, according to a press release.

Cancellations

Several trains including trains no.s 41061,41063, 41067, 41069 and 41071 between Chennai Beach and Velachery will be cancelled on 6th, 13th, 20th and 27th February (Saturdays), the press release said.

Also, several trains including train nos. 41531, 41533, 41535, 41537 and 41539 between Chennai Beach and Velachery will be cancelled on 7th, 14th, 21st and 28th February (Sundays).
title: Changes in MRTS schedules
